pkgmetadata.longdescription: # openctp-ctp[![PyPI - Python Version](https://badgen.net/badge/python/3.7|3.8|3.9|3.10|3.11/blue)](https://pypi.org/project/openctp-ctp)-----**Table of Contents**- [Installation](#installation)- [License](#license)## Installation```consolepip install openctp-ctp```## Example[Demo](https://github.com/Jedore/openctp-ctp-python/tree/main/demo)```pythonfrom openctp_ctp import mdapi, tdapimd_api = mdapi.CThostFtdcMdApi.CreateFtdcMdApi("market")td_api = tdapi.CThostFtdcTraderApi.CreateFtdcTraderApi('user_id')```## License`openctp-ctp` is distributed under the terms of the [MIT](https://spdx.org/licenses/MIT.html) license.
